name: Pasto nutriente (ver. 593)
desc: Sucrose's specialty. It looks like some strange alchemical product at first, but Sucrose insists that it is a healthy and nutritious meal, the result of many experiments and painstaking improvements. Its healthy green color comes from a mix of cream and natural vegetable juices... Wait, vegetable juices?

value.text: Revives the selected character and restores 20% of Max HP, then restores an additional 1500 HP.

value.name: Ricetta: tortino di granchio, prosciutto e verdure al forno
value.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making a Crab, Ham & Veggie Bake.

value.name: Uova di granchio
value.desc: A delicacy specific to female crabs. A rare and prized ingredient that isn't quite to everyone's taste.

value.name: Prosciutto
value.desc: Smoked leg meat. Even the thinnest slice is packed full of flavor.

value.name: Panna
value.desc: A dairy product made from milk. An essential ingredient in making pastries.

value.name: Cavolo
value.desc: A layered, leafy vegetable. Said to have originally been an ornamental plant, it certainly looks great in the pot.

value.name: Tortino di granchio, prosciutto e verdure al forno
value.desc: A luxurious bake. Cracks through the golden outer skin reveal a medley of rosy ham and bright vegetables. How tantalizing!

value.name: Sucrose
value.desc: Un'alchimista dalla vivace curiosit√† verso ogni cosa e ricercatrice bioalchemica.
